core_principles: Zero-Trust Aesthetics: Visuals must convey encryption and security (locks, shields, code).
True Dark Mode: Optimized for OLED and night-time usage, reducing eye strain.
Density with Clarity: High-density data presentation (vault items) without visual clutter.
Raspberry Pi Native: Lightweight visuals, avoiding heavy WebGL effects in favor of CSS-only micro-interactions.
design_philosophy.theme_strategy: Dark Mode Only (Primary). Light mode is secondary or non-existent for this specific 'Hacker/Pro' persona.

cards.style: bg-card border border-white/10 rounded-lg shadow-sm hover:border-white/20 transition-colors

inputs.style: bg-input border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-md h-10 px-3 text-sm placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

vault_list.item: group flex items-center justify-between p-4 bg-card hover:bg-white/5 border border-transparent hover:border-border rounded-md cursor-pointer transition-all

visual_enhancers.gradients: None. Use solid, matte colors for professional security look. 'Glow' effects allowed on primary actions only.

hero_background.description: Dark closed padlock on black surface, used for login/landing background overlay.

tech_texture.description: Server room closeup, used for 'Self-Hosted' feature section or about page.

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts imports to index.css immediately.
TAILWIND CONFIG: Update tailwind.config.js to use the specific 'Encrypted Obsidian' palette.
SHADCN OVERRIDES: Do not use default shadcn radii (0.5rem). Use smaller radii (0.375rem / rounded-md) for a 'sharper' tech feel.
DATA DENSITY: In the vault list, ensure passwords are hidden by default (******) with a toggle to show.
ZERO KNOWLEDGE UI: When loading the vault, show a 'Decryption' animation (even if fake/quick) to reinforce security perception.
MOBILE FIRST: The sidebar must become a bottom nav or hamburger menu on screens smaller than md.
TESTING: Add data-testid to all inputs (login, password, search) and buttons.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) sparingly.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
